detailsData.title: Dual Board Certifications
detailsData.content: Antonio Tomas is the sole attorney in the State of Florida who possesses dual board certifications in Criminal Defense and Tax Law. This unique qualification sets our firm apart in providing specialized legal services.

detailsData.title: Certified Public Accountant
detailsData.content: With over two decades of experience, Antonio Tomas also holds the esteemed title of a Certified Public Accountant. This additional expertise allows us to offer comprehensive tax and financial legal services.

valueProp: Are you looking for hard-hitting legal representation in the Miami-Dade or Broward County area? Dependable legal counsel can be hard to come by these days. At the Tomas Law Firm, you will find assertive legal advocacy when you need it most. Whether you are facing a complex tax controversy or criminal charges, the Miami lawyer at the firm will tirelessly defend your rights in court. If your future is at stake, it is vital that you obtain an experienced attorney to preserve your best interests and to protect your rights against the IRS.
